title: Add PCR primer designing for new variants
body: Call Primer designer at the end of pipeline for new variants

title: Dry validation
body:
Need to perform dry validation of pipeline. 

-GATK bundle NA12878 exome data

title: quality control checks
body:
Percentage mapping
Duplication rate
Insert size
Percentage on-target
Percentage coverage on-target greater than min_dp
Contamination
Gender check
Relatedness
concordance with dbSNP etc
Quality by cycle
BQSR
Ancestry check
Total number of reads

title: Make multisample exomedepth VCF files
body:
Make multisample exomedepth VCF files then annotate with contextual info:
GC content
MQ
MQRankSum
MQRMSE
Number of heterozygous calls
?B-allele frequency

title: optimise Java
body: GC tuning and memory optimisation needed

title: Add support for hotspot analysis
body: Need to check hotspot mutations are covered

title: MQ & SB
body: MQ & SB filters need careful consideration. MQ throws out a large number of TPs. FS & SOR may not be appropriate for tagmented libraries due to the unpredictable insert size & low bait spacing

title: Filter vcf by coordinate
body: Snv and indel calling should be padded 100bp and then selected +/-20bp using indel aware filter

title: filter AC=0
body: filter out variants which have no alternative alleles in the cohort

title: cnv analysis
body:
-autosomal regions only
-pad intervals by 250bp in each direction
-remove bad regions (DiagnoseTargets, SegDup, Mappability, GC)
-examine FPs for further changes

title: remove merge ubam step
body: supply all aligned bams to mark duplicate step to remove the need for merging ubams
